column4: Hello, I had an error with the 64 bit version upgrade of 7.10.  The update manager package failed, and now there's no way for me to upgrade my system.  It says everything is up to date, even though it isn't.  Is there any way to force the upgrade to run again, or look through the logs to fix the failed package?
try the console version: apt-get update && apt-get upgrade
OK, I'll try that real quick, and see what happens.
Thanks, it may be proceeding.  I have to watch for errors, but I'll stay in the room.
